title: On fractional Orlicz boundary Hardy inequalities
abstract:
We investigate the fractional Orlicz boundary Hardy-type inequality for
bounded Lipschitz domains. Further, we establish fractional Orlicz boundary
Hardy-type inequalities with logarithmic corrections for specific critical
cases across various domains, such as bounded Lipschitz domains, domains above
the graph of a Lipschitz function, and the complement of a bounded Lipschitz
domain.
